janamadhyayata tharjana rajapaksha yugaye madhyayata himiwa thibunu iranama sihipath kala sanin mathakayata nangenne dharmarathnam siwaram ghathanaya, lasantha wikramathunga ghathanaya, pragith eknaligoda athurudan karawima, upali thennakon kith noyar poddala jayantha wani madhyawedinta paradime siduwim, madhya aayathanawalata paharadim, ginithabim athulu mardanakari siduwim gananawaki.

suriyawawa jalasampadanaya magin bedaharina jalaya awapaha ganwi duganda wahanaya wima nisa pradeshaye jala paribhojakayan dolosdahasak pamana paniya jala dushkarathawata lakwa sitithi.suriyawawa jalasampadana madhyasthanaye piripahadu yanthrawala durwalathawayan nisa nisi paridi jalaya pawithra nowana bawa wartha we.

janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wisin eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayata ayath paksha samanga karanu labana sakachcha malawe ek sakachchawak lesa meya pawathwe.athuraliye rathana himiyange “piwithuru hetak” wadapiliwela idiripath kirimen pasuwa janadhipathiwaraya saha himiyan hamuwana prathama awasthawa meya wana athara ema sakachchawe di jathika hela urumaya muhuna di athi gatalu sambandhayen yam ekangathawakata eemata hakiyawak athayi me athara deshapalana aaranchimarga sandahan karayi.me sakachchawa sandaha jathika hela urumaya niyojanaya karamin ehi nayaka oomalpe sobhitha himi athuraliye rathana himi amathya patali champika ranawaka mahatha athulu pirisak sahabhagiwimata niyamithaya.
ee anuwa ehi mulika piyawara wiyayuththe janathawata wyawastha ketumpatha labadima saha owun sandaha wishala kalasimawak labadi pradhana sakachchawak sandaha mahajanathawa polambaawana eka.

mamada uruwelawehi senani niyam gamata pitathwa yannemi.”bhikshuun wahanse charikawaranayata meheyawamin thathagathayanan wahanse athi kala mema sampradaya anubudu mihinduu maharahathan wahansege lanka gamanatath ada dakwa lakdiwa bududahame wyapthiyatath hethu karana wiya.minisage sasara duk tharanaya pamanak nowa samajaye yahapatha sandaha nirawul niwaradi jiwitha gatha kirimatada, adhyapanaye sita samajiwanopaya dakwa siyalu shasthra gnyanayan labadimatada bhikshun wahanse thula thibu paramartha nisa gihi pawidi samajaya thula dadi bandimak athiwima me charikawaranaye prathipalaya wiya.dewanampiyathissa raju dawasa (kri.pu.247 sita 207) mihindu maharahathan wahanse shri lankawata wadama kirimen anathuruwa unwahanse samanga pamini panduka upasaka thanath dewanampiyathissa rajathumage amathiwarayaku wu aritta maha amathi athulu piirisakda pawidi upasampada kota lankawe buddha shasanaya sthawara kala seka.
